full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 182-2 Filed 03/26/21 Page 1 of 1 Supreme Court of Florida Certificate of Good Standing I, JOHN A. TOMASINO, Clerk of the Supreme Court of the State of Florida, do hereby certify that SIGRID STONE MCCAWLEY was admitted as an attorney and counselor entitled to practice law in all the Courts of the State of Florida on NOVEMBER 6, 1997, is presently in good standing, and that the private and professional character of the attorney appear to be good. WITNESS my hand and the Seal of the Supreme Court of Florida at Tallahassee, the Capital, this MARCH 24, 2021. Clerk of the Supreme Court of Florida DOJ-OGR-00002808

text_blocks.content: Supreme Court of Florida Certificate of Good Standing

I, JOHN A. TOMASINO, Clerk of the Supreme Court of the State of Florida, do hereby certify that SIGRID STONE MCCAWLEY was admitted as an attorney and counselor entitled to practice law in all the Courts of the State of Florida on NOVEMBER 6, 1997, is presently in good standing, and that the private and professional character of the attorney appear to be good.
WITNESS my hand and the Seal of the Supreme Court of Florida at Tallahassee, the Capital, this MARCH 24, 2021. Clerk of the Supreme Court of Florida

additional_notes: The document is a Certificate of Good Standing issued by the Supreme Court of Florida. It is a formal document with a seal and signature. The text is clear and legible.
